notifications.mailText: TUBE wurde erfolgreich durchgeführt. Wir haben TUBE in Ihre Wallet transferiert.
notifications.mailText2: Dieser Vorgang kann bis zu 60 Minuten dauern, bis Ihre TUBE verwendbar sind.
notifications.AlreadyPreviouslyAnother: has been successful and have exceeded the initial reward of 5 TUBEs.
notifications.EnableAirtimeRewards: To enable Airtime rewards for your account, please use a unique phone number.
notifications.hasAlreadybeenPreviously: has already been used previously by another account. Airtime rewards are currently disabled. To enable Airtime rewards for your account, please use a unique phone number. Thank you. Your BitTube Team
notifications.hasBeenUsed: has been successfully verified for your account. AirTime is now activated!
notifications.notePhoneNumber: Please note that this phone number has been used previously for verification. Therefore, the initial sign-up bonus of 5 TUBEs does not apply.
notifications.confirmTransfer: Please confirm this transfer by clicking the following confirmation link:
notifications.validLink: This link is valid for the next 30 minutes, after which this withdrawal request will be automatically cancelled.
notifications.internationalTransfers: Please note that international bank transfers can take up to 3-5 working days to process, sometimes more.
notifications.noTransferOrdered: If you did not order this transfer, please verify your account's security settings and contact support.
notifications.toVerifyBankText: To verify your bank account, we will send you the equivalent of 0.01 USD. You will find the transaction in the next days in your bank statement. The transaction contains a code composed as
notifications.pleaseUseTheCode: Please use this code in the Account settings in 'Convert my TUBEs' to verify your bank account.
notifications.toFinishTheProcess: Um den Prozess abzuschließen, tätigen Sie bitte innerhalb
notifications.dataBellow: eine Überweisung mit Hilfe der untenstehenden Daten:
notifications.asConcept: als Verwendungszweck in die Transaktionsdetails aufzunehmen. Ohne sie können wir Ihre Zahlung nicht zu Ihrem BitTube-Konto zuordnen.
notifications.bankNote: Wichtig! Die Bearbeitung einer Banküberweisung dauert ca.
notifications.bankTransferTime: 3 bis 7 Tage, obwohl sie manchmal länger dauern kann.
notifications.bodyPurchase: This email is just to inform you that your purchase of
notifications.bodyPurchase2: TUBEs has been transferred to your wallet.
notifications.notePurchase: Note: This is an automatic message, please do not reply. For any questions get in touch with support at our website.
notifications.notesUSD1: - If you are unable to add as many characters as our account holder name has, simply use 'TransferWise FBO' as recipient's name and add our company name (BitTubeInt OÜ) to the reference field.
notifications.notesUSD2: - If you are required to select 'checking or savings' as the receiving account type, please select 'checking'.
notifications.notesUSD3: - Use 'ACH routing number' if you prefer a low bank transaction fee. It is lower than a same-day payment. It usually takes 3-7 days to receive your TUBEs.
notifications.notesUSD4: - Use the 'Wire routing number' if you intend to make a same-day wire transfer which usually costs around $20-30!
notifications.notesUSD5: - International Wire / SWIFT can only be accepted from the following countries: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, British Virgin Islands, Canada, China, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Gibraltar, Guernsey, Greece, Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, Isle of Man, Italy, Japan, Jersey, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, UK, and United Arab Emirates.
notifications.noteGBP: Note: Please note that payments sent from outside of the UK will not be received and will bounce back to the sender.
notifications.noteNZD: Note: Only local NZD bank transfer payment types accepted!
notifications.noteAUD1: - Only local AUD bank transfer payment types accepted!
notifications.noteAUD2: - We can't currently accept transfers from Australian Superannuation Funds and Self Managed Superannuation Funds (SMSF)!
notifications.thanksForYourTime: Vielen Dank, dass Sie sich die Zeit nehmen, Ihre Identität zu verifizieren. Leider wurden eines oder mehrere der eingereichten Dokumente oder Fotos nicht akzeptiert. Bitte überprüfen Sie das markierte Dokument im Erweiterungsmenü und laden Sie ein neues Bild hoch.
notifications.tip1: Wenn ein Foto unscharf ist, versuchen Sie, es aus größerer Entfernung aufzunehmen und schneiden Sie das Bild dann zu
notifications.tip2: Achten Sie darauf, dass die Lichtreflexion keinen 'toten' Winkel über dem Dokument hinterlässt
notifications.tip3: Stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie nicht das gleiche Bild zweimal hochgeladen haben.
notifications.yourSubmitedDocuments: Ihre eingereichten Dokumente wurden genehmigt. Ihr BitTube-Konto ist nun verifiziert. Sie sind berechtigt, TUBEs per Debit-/Kreditkarte und Überweisung zu kaufen.
notifications.thanksForUseBitTube: Vielen Dank, dass Sie BitTube verwenden.
notifications.weHaveReceived: Wir haben Ihre Unterlagen zur Überprüfung erhalten. Der Prozess kann bis zu 72 Stunden dauern.
notifications.noteVerification: Hinweis: An Wochenenden und Feiertagen kann es länger dauern.
notifications.noteGBP1: This account supports incoming payments via CHAPS, BACS and Faster Payments.
notifications.noteGBP2: This account supports incoming domestic payments in GBP only.
notifications.noteUSD6: This account supports incoming payments via SWIFT only.
notifications.noteUSD7: Your bank may charge you for international payments.
notifications.noteUSD8: If your bank asks for your intermediary BIC, it’s BARCGB22.
